ATVI Wow classic may give a short pop until gamers remember just how brutal time consuming and just flat out unforgiving that version of the game was When it was popular most of the people playing at that time were in high school or college Their aging playerbase doesnt have 40 hours per week to play wow A lot of people will try it but it will fizzle over time as it falls to a niche market Thats not to say I wont mess around with it possibly just for laughs but I think people forget how things really were
